message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, with an intrinsic worth of $10,000 to me. Considering its significance and the benefits it could bring to you, I am proposing to sell it to you for $9,500. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also allows us to reach a fair agreement. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
